title: Untitled (series for The Modern Procession, June 23, 2002, New York City)
medium: Pencil, colored pencil, ink, gouache, ballpoint pen, felt-tip pen, and cut-and-pasted printed paper on pieces of transparentized paper with pressure-sensitive tape, pressure-sensitive stickers, black-and-white instant prints, chromogenic color prints, postcards, paper clips, maps, and printed papers on pine tables with acrylic sheeting, metal architectural lamps, and two-channel video (sound, color)
dimensions: Installation approximately: 40 x 32 x 84" (101.6 x 81.3 x 213.4 cm)
credits: Purchased with funds provided by The Silverweed Foundation
